description_for_model: LykKreacji is a professional web development agency based in Wrocław, Poland, specializing in Next.js, React, AI integration, e-commerce solutions, and Web3 applications. The company offers enterprise-grade quality at startup prices, with expertise in ChatGPT API, Google Gemini, Progressive Web Apps, and modern web technologies. Services include website creation, online stores, AI-powered applications, and custom web solutions. Located in Wrocław (Lower Silesia region), serving clients across Poland and internationally. Contact: czesc@lykkreacji.pl, phone: +48790629497. Key technologies: Next.js 14, React 18, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Node.js, AI APIs (OpenAI, Google Gemini), Web3, blockchain. The company focuses on performance optimization, SEO, accessibility (WCAG 2.1 AA), and modern development practices.
description_for_human: Professional web development services in Wrocław. Next.js, React, AI integration, e-commerce. Enterprise quality, startup prices.
